title: Needak Non-folding Hard-Bounce rebounder Black w/Stabilizing Bar-R04-05
features: Soft-Bounce spring absorbs as much as 85% of the impact. Hard Bounce is for users over 300 pounds
Industrial quality construction, suitable for home, office or commercial use
Easy to learn, easy to use, and provides incredibly efficient low impact exercise
All weather exercise for people off all ages and fitness levels
Lifetime Mfg. warranty.on Frame, 5 year on cleats & Springs, 2 year on matt, 10 year on bar
description: In addition to the finest rebounder, made in America of superior materials, you will receive

A FREE DVD on rebounding technique A FREE copy of the "Immune System" DVD video by Albert Carter (a prolific rebounding promoter, Carter demonstrates the Needak rebounder and explains immune system functioning.), And a FREE copy of an informative reprint article on rebounding. Lubrication package to get you started out right! American workmanship and quality materials provide you with the superior Needak rebounder."
